[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpvo7a0orz[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA libFuzzer-based test triggered a heap-buffer-overflow in the Mongoose networking [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcode. AddressSanitizer reports a one-byte out-of-bounds read in the function [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlocated in `src/mongoose/src/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385:18[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m when processing a [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzzed ICMP packet. The overflow occurs immediately past a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte heap allocation [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfor the packet buffer. The error is reproducible via the provided fuzz harness [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munder AddressSanitizer.[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Issue type  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  The error is classified as a heap-buffer-overflow: a single-byte read beyond the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocated heap region.[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Execution context  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  The fuzzer harness [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` in `src/mongoose/test/fuzz.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocates a buffer of size equal to the input length, wraps it in a `pkt` [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstructure, and feeds it into the Mongoose IP stack via `mg_tcpip_rx`. The crash [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moccurs inside `rx_icmp`, which is invoked by `mg_tcpip_rx`.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Key observations  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • AddressSanitizer log shows the offending read at address [0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m, which [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis immediately past the end of a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte allocation [0m[1;39m([0m[39mregion [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m0x504000000150[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The allocation happens in the fuzz harness [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m95[0m[39m of `fuzz.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m via `malloc`, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcreating the `pkt->pbuf`.  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The stack trace:  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    – `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, pkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[39m  [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    – `mg_tcpip_rx` at net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:897[0m[39m  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    – `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` at fuzz.[0m[1;92mc:106[0m[39m  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    – libFuzzer driver routines  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Code areas to inspect  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. **rx_icmp function [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.c around line [0m[1;36m385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:** examine packet parsing [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlogic and any index calculations or header length checks for the ICMP payload.  [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. **mg_tcpip_rx dispatcher [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.c around line [0m[1;36m897[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:** observe how packet[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength and protocol fields are validated before calling `rx_icmp`.  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. **Packet structure and buffer management:** review the definition of `pkt`, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mespecially fields `pbuf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata pointer[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and length fields, to ensure consistency [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbetween declared length and actual buffer size.  [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. **Fuzz harness [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/mongoose/test/fuzz.c around lines [0m[1;36m95[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m106[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:** note how [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minput size is used to allocate and initialize `pkt` and how the test loop invokes [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe stack.  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThese components together form the execution path that leads to the overflow and [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mshould be reviewed to gain a complete understanding of bounds checking around ICMP [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpacket handling.[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m860[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_hexdump[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf, len > [0m[1;36m16[0m[39m ? [0m[1;36m16[0m[39m: len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m861[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated - runt?[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m862[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->enable_mac_check &&[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:889[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m897[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m889[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m890[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IP[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m891[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m                                   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIPv4 options[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m892[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m893[0m[39m:    else[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m894[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m895[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m896[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, &pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m897[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTo eliminate the one-byte OOB read in rx_icmp while preserving existing behavior [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand not touching the harness or fuzz logic, introduce an explicit length check for [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe ICMP header at the top of rx_icmp. Concretely:[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. In src/net_builtin.c, locate rx_icmp [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m382[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. Immediately upon entry, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbefore dereferencing pkt->icmp or pkt->icmp->type, verify that the buffer actually [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcontains a full ICMP header. Because pkt->pay.buf is placed just after the IP [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader [0m[1;39m([0m[39mvia mkpay[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and pkt->pay.len holds the remaining bytes, the condition[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   guarantees that pkt->icmp [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhich points to pkt->pay.buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is entirely within the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocated buffer. Failing this check, silently drop the packet.[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. The minimal patch in rx_icmp becomes:[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Ensure the ICMP header is fully present before reading *[0m[35m/[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Existing logic: only react to ICMP echo requests for our IP *[0m[35m/[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[33m...[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. No other callers [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_rx, rx_ip, fuzz harness[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are altered. This single [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mguard blocks any undersized packets [0m[1;39m([0m[39mincluding [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte “Ethernet+IP only” frames[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfrom ever entering the echo-request path, thus eliminating the AddressSanitizer [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfailure.[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mWhy this is optimal:[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- It directly addresses the root cause [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmissing ICMP-header boundary check[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdoes so at the site of the invalid read.[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- It preserves all existing functionality [0m[1;39m([0m[39mecho-reply generation, handling of full [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mor oversized packets[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- It avoids touching external or harness code, so fuzzing inputs remain valid and [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexisting tests/harnesses continue to work.[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- It uses the already-computed pkt->pay.len, so there is no new dependence on [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mraw.len or manual offset recomputation.[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Side effects are minimal: undersized ICMP packets are dropped early [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhich is [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39macceptable behavior[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m without impacting full-length traffic.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mNo further changes are needed.  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/dev/[0m[95mnull[0m                                                                            [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO: Running with entropic power schedule [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0xFF[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m100[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                              [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO: Seed: [0m[1;36m3617701594[0m                                                               [2m               [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Poisoned by user:        f7[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Container overflow:      fc[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Array cookie:            ac[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Intra object redzone:    bb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ASan internal:           fe[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Left alloca redzone:     ca[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Right alloca redzone:    cb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpvo7a0orz[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAn AddressSanitizer heap-buffer-overflow was observed in function `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfile [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`net_builtin.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, where a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read occurs just past the end of a dynamically [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocated packet buffer. A patch was attempted by adding an early return that [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecks `pkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` before any ICMP header access. After [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mapplying this patch and rerunning the same fuzz input [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m times, the crash still [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreproduces at the same source location, indicating the added length check did not [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprevent the out-of-bounds read.[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial Issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• During fuzz testing of the Mongoose network stack [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mongoose/test/fuzz.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAddressSanitizer reports a heap-buffer-overflow in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, pkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mline [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m of `src/net_builtin.c`.  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• The overflow is a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read at address `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`, which is immediately [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mafter a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte heap allocation [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x150[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• The offending code path is:  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` allocates a buffer with `malloc` and passes it to [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_tcpip_rx`.  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. `mg_tcpip_rx` calls `rx_icmp`.  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. In `rx_icmp`, the code reads `pkt->icmp->type` without sufficient bounds [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecking on the payload.  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mKey Observations in the ASan Log  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• The crash stack shows `rx_icmp` as the first application frame [0m[1;39m([0m[39m#[0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• The allocation site is inside the fuzzer harness [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`fuzz.[0m[1;92mc:95[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m via `malloc`.  [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• The reported invalid access is exactly at offset [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m, the size of the allocation, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mindicating off-by-one or insufficient header validation.  [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• The shadow memory indicates a redzone immediately following the allocated region.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• In `src/net_builtin.c`, at the top of `rx_icmp`, the following guard was added:  [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    ```c[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Ensure the ICMP header is fully present before reading *[0m[35m/[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    ```  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• This check was intended to verify that the incoming packet’s payload length [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->pay.len`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is at least the size of `struct icmp` before dereferencing [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->icmp`.  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• The patch context around line [0m[1;36m380[0m[39m now looks like:  [0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    ```diff[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39micmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    ```  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Result  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• After rebuilding and fuzzing, the same heap-buffer-overflow is triggered at the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msame source line [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• The log structure mirrors the initial crash, confirming the new length check did [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnot catch the problematic input.  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• The definition and initialization of `struct pkt`:  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  – How are `pkt->pay.ptr` and `pkt->pay.len` derived from the raw input?  [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  – Does `pkt->icmp` point directly at `pkt->pay.ptr`, or is there an offset [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39madjustment?  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• The parsing logic in `mg_tcpip_rx` leading into `rx_icmp`:  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  – Are packet headers validated before setting `pkt->icmp`?  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  – Is IP header length [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`ip->hlen`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and total length checked?  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• All code that sets up or slices the packet buffer prior to ICMP handling.  [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• Similar code paths for other protocols in `net_builtin.c` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mTCP, UDP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to see if [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39manalogous checks are missing.  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• The fuzzer harness [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`fuzz.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to understand how packet data is fed into the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnetwork API and whether additional pre-checks are needed there.[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m390[0m[39m:    struct icmp *icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root Cause Analysis[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The out-of-bounds read in rx_icmp occurs because we unconditionally [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdereference pkt->icmp->type without guaranteeing that the ICMP header is fully [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcontained in the allocated buffer.[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Although rx_ip performs a length check [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbefore calling rx_icmp, that check uses pkt->pay.len *after* [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, i.e. payload [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength *after* the header, not the total IP‐payload length *including* the header. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mConsequently, rx_icmp can be invoked when the buffer is large enough to claim space[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfor “header + payload” but still too small to safely read the header itself.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Furthermore, rx_ip always sets `pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhich only works if the IP header has no options [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m20[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. If there are IPv4 [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moptions, the ICMP pointer will be misaligned, potentially exacerbating [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mout-of-bounds behavior.[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Strategy to Fix[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. In rx_ip [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIPv4 dispatch[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, compute the actual IP‐header length and set [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt->icmp accordingly.[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Replace[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        with[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        size_t ip_hlen = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        uint8_t *base = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->ip;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbase + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - This ensures the ICMP pointer accounts for IPv4 options if present.[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Then keep the existing guard[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        which now correctly checks that the total IP‐payload length [0m[1;39m([0m[39mheader + [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpayload[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is at least the size of an ICMP header.[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. In rx_icmp, add a *raw-buffer* bounds check *before* reading any fields of [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe ICMP header.[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - At the very top of rx_icmp [0m[1;39m([0m[39mabove the `pkt->icmp->type` access[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, insert:[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          uint8_t *start = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->icmp;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          uint8_t *end   = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstart + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not enough bytes for full ICMP header[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - This pointer-based check guarantees that the entire struct icmp header [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mresides within the allocated buffer, eliminating the one-byte-read overflow.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   C. Remove or *deprioritize* the incorrect payload-length guard in rx_icmp[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - The previous patch added[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        at the top of rx_icmp. It should be removed or left *after* the raw‐buffer [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mguard, because pkt->pay.len here represents only the payload *after* the ICMP [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader, not the header itself.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Preservation of Existing Logic[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The IPv4 truncation, CRC check, MAC filtering, and IP‐fragmentation logic [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mremain untouched.[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The ICMP echo-reply logic [0m[1;39m([0m[33mtype[0m[39m==[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, computing hlen, echoing with tx_ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpreserved exactly.[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Fuzz harness and higher‐level mg_tcpip_rx loops are not modified.[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Why This Is Optimal[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - A raw-buffer bounds check is both necessary and sufficient to prevent any [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mattempt to access header bytes past the allocation.[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Adjusting the ICMP pointer to respect the actual IP header length fixes [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointer alignment for packets with IP options.[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No overly broad exception‐style catches are added; invalid or truncated ICMP [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpackets are simply dropped.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Similar patterns [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpointer+size vs. buffer end checks[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are already used [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39melsewhere in net_builtin.c [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., at the top of mg_tcpip_rx for eth and ip6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; this [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfollows the same defensive style.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Potential Side Effects and Mitigations[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This change may drop some malformed or truncated ICMP packets that previously [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwould have been processed [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor crash[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. That is the correct behavior: do not process [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mincomplete headers.[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Performance impact is negligible [0m[1;39m([0m[39mone pointer comparison per ICMP packet[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No other tests or protocols are affected, as only the ICMP path is patched.[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Code Ranges to Patch[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code_range>src/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:794[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m806[0m[39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_range[0m[39m>  [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmodify rx_ip [0m[33mproto[0m[39m==[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m block[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code_range>src/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:382[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m390[0m[39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_range[0m[39m>  [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpatch rx_icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/24/25 22:43:30][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=873153;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=205959;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m[12/24/25 22:47:51][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m [1m[[0mlogging_performance[1m][0m[1m([0mmongoose Patching[1m)[0m Took [1;36m6.25[0m seconds; [33mexception[0m=[3;91mFalse[0m   ]8;id=10785;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py\[2mcontext_managers.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=66534;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py#23\[2m23[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m         [33mexception[0m=[3;91mFalse[0m                                                               [2m                      [0m
[2;36m                   [0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m [1m[[0mlogging_performance[1m][0m[1m([0mmongoose Running PoV[1m)[0m Started[33m...[0m                         ]8;id=169234;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py\[2mcontext_managers.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=506051;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py#9\[2m9[0m]8;;\
[2;36m[12/24/25 22:47:56][0m[2;36m [0m[1;31mERROR   [0m PoV found:                                                                           ]8;id=99165;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/evaluator/services/default/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=88014;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/evaluator/services/default/__init__.py#102\[2m102[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         - Stdout:                                                                            [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + [33mFUZZER[0m=[35mfuzz[0m                                                                        [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + shift                                                                              [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + [32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m [32m'!'[0m -v TESTCASE [32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                            [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + [33mTESTCASE[0m=[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m                                                                 [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + [32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m [32m'!'[0m -f [35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m [32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                           [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + export [33mRUN_FUZZER_MODE[0m=[35minteractive[0m                                                 [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + [33mRUN_FUZZER_MODE[0m=[35minteractive[0m                                                        [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + export [33mFUZZING_ENGINE[0m=[35mlibfuzzer[0m                                                    [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + [33mFUZZING_ENGINE[0m=[35mlibfuzzer[0m                                                           [2m               [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mversion != [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m || ihl < [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IPv4 or invalid IHL[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      size_t ip_hlen = ihl * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Ensure full IP header [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwith options[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is present[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated header[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      uint16_t total_len = [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtotal_len < ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Invalid total length[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      size_t frame_len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m total_len + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mframe_len < pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        pkt.raw.len = frame_len;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Downstream code will recompute protocol header pointers[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m                                   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle IPv4 [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moptions[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     else[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Right alloca redzone:    cb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpvo7a0orz[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is a heap-buffer-overflow detected by AddressSanitizer during a [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlibFuzzer run in the function `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The fuzzer triggers a [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mone-byte out-of-bounds read of the ICMP header when processing a crafted packet.  [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA patch was applied to add explicit boundary checks both in `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbefore [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39massigning `pkt->icmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and in the top of `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbefore dereferencing the ICMP [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The added code compares pointer arithmetic against `pkt->raw.buf + [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt->raw.len` and returns early if the header does not fully fit.  [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mDespite these checks, the same AddressSanitizer error persists in `rx_icmp` at the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexact location and under similar conditions. The crash log after the patch shows [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe identical one-byte read beyond a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte buffer region, indicating that the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcurrent checks do not cover the actual out-of-bounds access.[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A libFuzzer-based test exercises the TCP/IP stack implementation in [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`net_builtin.c`.  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- On handling IP packets with protocol field [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mICMP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, `mg_tcpip_rx` computes a [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointer to an ICMP header just past the IP header and stores it in `pkt->icmp`.  [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `rx_icmp` reads fields from this header [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g. `pkt->icmp->type`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, but for certain[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzzed inputs the pointer can point so close to the end of the allocated packet [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer that reading even the first byte overruns the allocation by one byte.  [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The ASan report pinpoints the overflow at `rx_icmp` line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m, called via [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_tcpip_rx` → `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`.[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m380[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, a guard block was added:[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    • Compute `start = pkt->icmp` and `end = pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len`.  [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    • If `start + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > end`, return immediately.  [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m799[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the code that set `pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m*[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` was replaced with:[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    • Compute the IP header length as `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m`.  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    • Set `pkt->icmp` to `base + ip_hlen`.  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    • Perform a similar bounds check: if `pkt->icmp + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` extends [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpast `raw.buf + raw.len`, return early.[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch result  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Re-running the fuzzer [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m100[0m[39m runs[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m immediately reproduces the same AddressSanitizer[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mviolation at `net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[39m` in `rx_icmp`.  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The crash report shows the same read of one byte just past a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte region [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x[0m[33m...[0m[1;36m150[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x[0m[33m...[0m[1;36m172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, allocated in the fuzz test harness.  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The call stack and “shadow bytes” context are effectively unchanged, confirming [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat the new checks did not prevent the overflow.[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for further investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The logic in `rx_icmp` may read beyond the ICMP header into its payload or [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfollow-up fields. Review all dereferences in `rx_icmp`, especially any reads after [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe initial header check.  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The calculation of packet lengths [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->raw.len`, `pkt->pay.len`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and their [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrelation to IP and ICMP header sizes. Ensure that all packet-processing paths [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39menforce correct minimum sizes.  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The interaction between `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and `rx_icmp`, since payload [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandling could rely on `pkt->pay.len` rather than `raw.len`.  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Any other branches in `mg_tcpip_rx` that handle fragmented or truncated [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpackets—boundary conditions may differ in those code paths.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
