[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Summary of Root Causes[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The code unconditionally assumes a [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m-byte IP header [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhen parsing and validating packets, ignoring the IP header length [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m field. [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mMalformed IHL values [0m[1;39m([0m[39m>[0m[1;36m5[0m[39m or <[0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m can cause header pointers [0m[1;39m([0m[39mICMP, UDP, TCP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to be [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcomputed outside the allocated buffer without an early exit.[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The helper `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` computes payload length as an unsigned subtraction [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwithout clamping negative results, so if the payload pointer lies past the end of [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`raw.buf`, `pkt->pay.len` becomes a huge unsigned value. That can bypass [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mminimal-size checks in `rx_ip` and lead to later OOB reads.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Although a guard was added at the top of `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, it only covers the ICMP [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader itself, not earlier pointer mis-computations or the poisoned `pkt->pay.len`.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mMoreover, leftover code paths [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_ip` fragmentation branch, other protocol [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandlers[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m still use the old `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` logic.[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Key Invariants to Preserve[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Ethernet → IP demux must still first verify that `pkt->raw.len` covers the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mEthernet header + minimal IP header.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Tests and existing logic that honor the total IP length [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m must remain.[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The fuzz harness entry points and `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` API must remain unchanged; only [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minternal packet parsing logic is to be hardened.[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Patch Outline[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. Enhance the Ethernet→IP demux [0m[1;39m([0m[39minside `mg_tcpip_rx`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to parse and enforce the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIHL field:[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. After confirming `pkt->raw.len >= [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mread the first byte of `pkt->ip->ver`:[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           – Extract `version = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, must be [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m.[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           – Extract `ihl = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, must be ≥[0m[1;36m5[0m[39m.[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Compute `ip_hlen = ihl * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m`.[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. If `pkt->raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ip_hlen`, return early [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtruncated [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. Ensure the wire-level total length [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is at least [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`ip_hlen`. Then truncate `pkt->raw.len` to `[0m[1;35mmin[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->raw.len, [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m. Store `ip_hlen` in a new local [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor in `pkt->flags`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m so downstream code can[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreuse.[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. Refactor `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` protocol dispatch to use `ip_hlen` rather than [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`:[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      – Remove all instances of `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and the old `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` checks.[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      – For every protocol branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39mICMP, UDP, TCP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Compute the protocol header pointer as:[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m              `uint8_t *base = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->ip;`[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m              `pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbase + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`  [0m[1;39m([0m[39msimilarly for `udp`,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`tcp`[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Define `uint8_t *raw_end = pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len;`[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. If `[0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt-><proto> + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt-><proto>[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > raw_end`, return [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mearly.[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. Call `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt-><proto> + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`  [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnow guaranteed that [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->pay.len` is non-negative because header fits[0m[1;39m)[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m. Invoke the specific handler [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_icmp`, etc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   C. Simplify or remove the redundant guard in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`:[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      – Given the above protocol-branch checks, `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` can safely assume its [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader pointer and `pkt->pay.len` are valid.[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      – Optionally retain a minimal assert at `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` entry:[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           ```[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           uint8_t *start = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp,[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                   *end   = pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstart + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           ```[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         but no further in-function boundary checks are needed before reading [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->icmp->type`.[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   D. [0m[1;39m([0m[39mOptional[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Clamp negative payload sizes in `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`:[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      – Change the payload-length computation from an unchecked unsigned [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubtraction to:[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           ```[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           ptrdiff_t diff = &pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m - [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mp;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           size_t len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdiff > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m ? [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mdiff : [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           pkt->pay = [0m[1;35mmg_str_n[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mp, len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           ```[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         so that no branch can produce an excessively large `pkt->pay.len`. This [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchange is limited in scope [0m[1;39m([0m[39minside `mkpay`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and does not alter its public API.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Implementation Steps[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. In `[0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround the Ethernet→IP demux code[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        – Insert IHL parsing & checks [0m[1;39m([0m[39mas outlined in A[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        – Store or pass `ip_hlen` to the subsequent call to `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. In `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m790[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m820[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        – Remove the old `pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;` code.[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        – Add the new, IHL-aware pointer computation & boundary check before [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mas in B[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        – Mirror the same pattern for UDP [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->udp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and TCP [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->tcp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m if [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdesired [0m[1;39m([0m[39mto anticipate similar crashes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. In `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`:[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        – Either remove the early header-guard [0m[1;39m([0m[39mif confident protocol branch covers[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mit[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or leave a minimal one.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. [0m[1;39m([0m[39mOptional[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Patch `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` in its single definition to clamp negative [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdifferences.[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Rationale & Side-Effect Mitigation[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - By validating `ihl>=[0m[1;36m5[0m[39m` and using `ip_hlen` everywhere, we eliminate all cases [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhere pointers land inside or past the IP options space.[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Early returns drop malformed packets; legitimate traffic with IP options [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mihl>[0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m will still parse correctly, as long as the packet contains the option [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbytes.[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Constraining `pkt->raw.len` to respect the total length field prevents reading[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbeyond the buffer when an attacker sets a small `ip.len`.[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Clamping `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` prevents a malformed upstream pointer from inflating the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpayload length and bypassing further checks.[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This preserves existing transport logic [0m[1;39m([0m[39mecho replies, UDP/TCP handling[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdoes not touch the fuzz harness nor public APIs.[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - We keep the same fuzzer entry points, so no test or harness modifications are [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mneeded; all existing tests and fuzz targets should continue to pass.[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Verification[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Rebuild with ASan + libFuzzer and confirm the original one-byte OOB no longer [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreproduces.[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Run the full test suite to ensure no regressions.[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Add a few targeted unit tests: [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       * A minimal IP packet with IHL<[0m[1;36m5[0m[39m must be dropped.[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       * An IP packet with IHL>[0m[1;36m5[0m[39m but truncated payload must be dropped at demux.[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       * Valid IP+options+ICMP packets still echo.[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/24/25 22:48:13][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=400542;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=179241;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m            [35m/[0m[35m/[0m [1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1m([0m[1m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m, [1m([0mint[1m)[0m len[1m)[0m[1m)[0m;                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +  [1m{[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +    char *raw_start = pkt->raw.buf;                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +    char *raw_end   = pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len;                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +    char *icmp_ptr  = [1m([0mchar *[1m)[0mpkt->icmp;                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +    if [1m([0micmp_ptr [1m<[0m[39m raw_start || icmp_ptr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > raw_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Malformed/too-short ICMP header: drop packet[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      return;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m@@ [0m[1;36m-799[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m +[0m[1;36m808[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m20[0m[39m @@[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     struct mg_connection *c = [0m[1;35mgetpeer[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->mgr, pkt, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      uint8_t ver_ihl = pkt->ip->ver;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      uint8_t ihl = ver_ihl & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      size_t ip_hlen = ihl * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      uint8_t *base = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->ip;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      uint8_t *raw_end = pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      struct icmp *icmp_hdr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbase + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mihl < [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m ||[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+          [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + ip_hlen > raw_end ||[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+          [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39micmp_hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp_hdr[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > raw_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        return;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      pkt->icmp = icmp_hdr;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m@@ [0m[1;36m-880[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m14[0m[39m +[0m[1;36m901[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m24[0m[39m @@[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip6 + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mrx_ip6[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, &pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x800[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    pkt.ip = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    pkt.ip = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncate frame to what IP header tells us[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m < pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-      pkt.raw.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IP[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Validate IP version, IHL, and total length[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      uint8_t ver_ihl = pkt.ip->ver;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      uint8_t version = ver_ihl >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m, ihl = ver_ihl & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mversion != [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m || ihl < [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IPv4 or invalid IHL[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      size_t ip_hlen = ihl * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Ensure full IP header [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwith options[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is present[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated header[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      uint16_t total_len = [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtotal_len < ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Invalid total length[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      size_t frame_len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m total_len + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mframe_len < pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        pkt.raw.len = frame_len;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Downstream code will recompute protocol header pointers[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m                                   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle IPv4 [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moptions[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     else[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Patch [0m[33mResult[0m[39m===[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe project’s libFuzzer-based harness triggered an AddressSanitizer [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow in the function `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow occurs when processing a crafted Ethernet→IPv4→ICMP packet: the code reads[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mone byte past the end of the heap‐allocated input region. [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA patch was applied to add explicit bounds checks before parsing the ICMP header [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mverifying IHL, IP header length, and total buffer length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and to tighten [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalidation of the IPv4 header in the Ethernet handler. Despite these changes, [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrerunning the fuzzer still produced the same heap-buffer-overflow in `rx_icmp` at [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe identical location, showing that the patch did not eliminate the out‐of‐bounds [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maccess.[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial Issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A single-input fuzzer invocation [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m allocates a buffer of[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msize equal to the test input, populates a `pkt.raw` structure, and calls into the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnetwork stack [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_tcpip_rx` → `rx_icmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `rx_icmp`, the code unconditionally casts past the IP header to an ICMP header[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwith:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    ```[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    ```[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  and then calls `mkpay` and `rx_icmp`.  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- ASan reports a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m‐byte read heap-buffer-overflow at address `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexactly one byte past the upper bound of the allocated region [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x504000000150[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`. This indicates that `pkt->icmp` pointed to an [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mout‐of‐bounds location and that `rx_icmp` dereferenced `pkt->icmp->type` or another[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfield beyond the valid region.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In the block handling `pkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mICMP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Extract `ver_ihl = pkt->ip->ver`, compute `ihl = ver_ihl & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[39m`, and `ip_hlen[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m= ihl * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Compute `base = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip` and `raw_end = pkt->raw.buf + [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt->raw.len`.  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Compute `icmp_hdr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbase + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. Check that `ihl >= [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m`, that `base + ip_hlen` and `icmp_hdr + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m` lie within [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mbase, raw_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m. If checks pass, assign `pkt->icmp = icmp_hdr`, otherwise `return;`.  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In the Ethernet IPv4 handler [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhen `pkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x800[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Validate `pkt.raw.len` ≥ size of Ethernet + IPv4 base header.  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Extract `ver_ihl`, split into `version` and `ihl`, require `version == [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m` and [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`ihl >= [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Verify the raw buffer contains the full IPv4 header including options: [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt.raw.len >= [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ip_hlen`.  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. Extract `total_len = [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and require `total_len >= [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mip_hlen`.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m. Adjust `pkt.raw.len = [0m[1;35mmin[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len, total_len + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The rest of the code path [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcalls to `mkpay` and `rx_icmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m remained unchanged.[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Result  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- After rebuilding with AddressSanitizer and rerunning the fuzzer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`-[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe same heap-buffer-overflow is still reported at `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, pkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mline [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The stack trace and memory addresses are identical in nature: a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m‐byte read just [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpast the allocated region, in the same function.  [0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- This indicates that some parsing paths or pointer arithmetic in the ICMP handling[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstill lead to `pkt->icmp` pointing out of bounds, or that `mkpay`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`rx_icmp` index [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdeeper into the ICMP structure without further bounds checks.[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The implementation of `rx_icmp` itself: which ICMP header fields are dereferenced[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand whether they assume additional payload bytes.  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The function `mkpay`, which adjusts `pkt->pay` based on `pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m`, [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpotentially depending on `pkt->pay.len`.  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Any subsequent uses of `pkt->icmp->type`, `pkt->icmp->code`, or ICMP payload that[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmight read beyond the header.  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Edge cases in IPv4 option parsing or combinations of IHL and `pkt->raw.len` that [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbypass the new checks but still allow out‐of‐bounds access.  [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The code paths in `mg_tcpip_rx` leading into ICMP handling, including [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfragmentation logic and header reassembly, to see if `pkt->raw.len` or [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->pay.len` can be under‐ or overestimated.[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -v TESTCASE [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mTESTCASE[0m[39m=[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -f [0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvm.mmap_rnd_bits = [0m[1;36m28[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/out/[0m[95mfuzz[0m[39m -[0m[33mrss_limit_mb[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m2560[0m[39m -[0m[33mtimeout[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m25[0m[39m -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m [0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -[0m[33mtimeout_exitcode[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m < [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/dev/[0m[95mnull[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO: Running with entropic power schedule [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0xFF[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m100[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m0x5594ccc6caa2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/out/[0m[95mfuzz[0m[39m: Running [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m inputs [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m [0m[1;35mtime[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m each.[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mRunning: [0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mnet_builtin.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m385:18[0m                                              [2m                [0m
