[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m137[0m[39m:  struct icmp *icmp;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:41[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m49[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m41[0m[39m:struct eth [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m42[0m[39m:  uint8_t dst[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Destination MAC address[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m43[0m[39m:  uint8_t src[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Source MAC address[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m44[0m[39m:  uint16_t type;   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Ethernet type[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m45[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m;[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m46[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m47[0m[39m:struct ip [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m48[0m[39m:  uint8_t ver;    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Version[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m49[0m[39m:  uint8_t tos;    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Unused[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:149[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m152[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m149[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct pkt *pkt, void *p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m150[0m[39m:  pkt->pay =[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m151[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmg_str_n[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m p, [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m - [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m152[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:882[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m894[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m882[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x800[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m883[0m[39m:    pkt.ip = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m884[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m885[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncate frame to what IP header tells us[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m886[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m < pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m887[0m[39m:      pkt.raw.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m888[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m889[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m890[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IP[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m891[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m                                   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIPv4 options[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m892[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m893[0m[39m:    else[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m894[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:794[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m806[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m794[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m795[0m[39m:  uint16_t frag = [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->frag[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m796[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrag & IP_MORE_FRAGS_MSK || frag & IP_FRAG_OFFSET_MSK[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m797[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m798[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m799[0m[39m:    struct mg_connection *c = [0m[1;35mgetpeer[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->mgr, pkt, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m800[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m801[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m802[0m[39m:    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m803[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m804[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m805[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m806[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:382[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m390[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m382[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m383[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m384[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m385[0m[39m:    size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m386[0m[39m:    size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m387[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m388[0m[39m:    struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m389[0m[39m:                          [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m390[0m[39m:    struct icmp *icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root-Cause Analysis  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The AddressSanitizer reports a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read past the end of the heap‐allocated [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer when `rx_icmp` dereferences `pkt->icmp->type`.  [0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All prior patches tightened IPv4 parsing [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL, total_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and improved bounds [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecks in `rx_ip` and the Ethernet handler, yet the bug persists.  [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This indicates that some malformed or corner-case input still makes it into [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_icmp` with an out-of-bounds `pkt->icmp` pointer.  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - While earlier fixes guarded upstream [0m[1;39m([0m[39min `mg_tcpip_rx` and `rx_ip`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, there [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mremains no last-resort sanity check immediately before dereferencing the ICMP [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader in `rx_icmp`.  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Proposed Fix  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. Add an explicit boundary check at the very start of `rx_icmp` to validate [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat the entire ICMP header lies within the packet’s raw buffer. If it does not, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msilently drop the packet.  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. Preserve all existing logic in `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mping-echo detection, reply assembly[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvia `tx_ip`, etc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m—only add a guard that prevents any OOB read of `pkt->icmp`.  [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Detailed Steps  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `src/net_builtin.c`, locate the definition of `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m382[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Immediately before any access to `pkt->icmp->type`, insert:  [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       char *raw_start = pkt->raw.buf;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       char *raw_end   = pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       char *icmp_ptr  = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Ensure ICMP header is fully inside the received buffer:[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp_ptr < raw_start || icmp_ptr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > raw_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Malformed/too-short packet: drop[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         return;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - After this guard, the existing code [0m[1;39m([0m[39mreading `pkt->icmp->type`, computing [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`plen`, calling `tx_ip`, etc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m remains unchanged.  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Justification & Preservation of Behavior  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - By placing this check at the top of `rx_icmp`, we catch *any* case where [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->icmp` was mis-parsed or lies outside the packet’s actual data region—even if [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mupstream parsing failed to reject it.  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This is a minimal, localized change that does *not* alter the harness, fuzzing[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msetup, or any higher-level logic. It simply enforces the same kind of bounds check [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat AddressSanitizer is warning about, right at the point of use.  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Legitimate packets with a complete ICMP header [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m still pass through [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munmodified, so no existing functionality or positive test cases are affected.  [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Potential Side Effects & Mitigations  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Side Effect: Very slightly increased CPU cost for an extra pointer comparison [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mper ICMP packet.  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     Mitigation: Negligible in almost all environments; the check is a single [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbranch and will be optimized.  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Side Effect: Malformed ICMP packets will now be dropped earlier.  [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     Mitigation: This aligns with the security goal of refusing to process [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mout-of-bounds data; any packet that truly contained a full ICMP header will still [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbe processed.  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Reference to Similar Patterns  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Upstream, IPv4 option parsing was tightened by validating `pkt->ip + ip_hlen` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlies within `raw_end`. This is the same principle—validate header pointers against [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`raw_end` before dereferencing. Here, we apply it to the ICMP header itself.  [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. No Harness or Test Code Changes  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - We only modify `src/net_builtin.c`.  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - We do *not* touch any fuzzing harness, test files, or external libraries.  [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying this patch, rebuilding under AddressSanitizer and rerunning the same[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzzer input should no longer trigger the heap-buffer-overflow in `rx_icmp`.  [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/24/25 22:51:38][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=235099;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=39764;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Poisoned by user:        f7[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Container overflow:      fc[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Array cookie:            ac[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Intra object redzone:    bb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ASan internal:           fe[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Left alloca redzone:     ca[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Right alloca redzone:    cb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpvo7a0orz[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAn AddressSanitizer heap-buffer-overflow was reported in the function `rx_icmp` [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhen fuzzing the networking code in `src/net_builtin.c`. The overflow occurred [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhile reading an ICMP header byte just past the end of a malformatted packet [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer. A patch was attempted that adds boundary checks in three places: at the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart of `rx_icmp`, in the IPv4‐ICMP dispatch branch of `mg_tcpip_rx`, and in the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mgeneral IPv4 packet handler before protocol demultiplexing. After applying the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpatch, the same ASan error recurred at the same location in `rx_icmp`, indicating [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe overflow was not prevented.[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial Issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Fuzzer command:  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  `docker run … reproduce fuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m` on `[0m[35m/out/[0m[95mfuzz[0m[39m` with libFuzzer.  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- ASan report:  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - ERROR in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, pkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385:18[0m[39m  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - READ of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m at address `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`, exactly one byte past a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x[0m[39m…[0m[1;36m150[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x[0m[39m…[0m[1;36m172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Call stack:  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. `rx_icmp`  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. `mg_tcpip_rx`  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. libFuzzer internals  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - The packet [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->raw.buf`, [0m[33mlength[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m34[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is shorter than the ICMP header plus [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpayload, leading to out-of-bounds memory access when `pkt->icmp` is dereferenced.[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. In `static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m381[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:  [0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   Inserted a block that computes  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```  [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   raw_start = pkt->raw.buf;  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   raw_end   = raw_start + pkt->raw.len;  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   icmp_ptr  = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp;  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   if [0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp_ptr < raw_start || icmp_ptr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > raw_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m  [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m drop too-short packet  [0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m  [0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```  [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. In the IPv4‐ICMP branch of `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m799[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   Replaced simple pointer arithmetic  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```  [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```  [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   with a block that:  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Extracts IHL from `pkt->ip->ver`, computes `ip_hlen = ihl*[0m[1;36m4[0m[39m`.  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Validates `ihl >= [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Ensures `[0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + ip_hlen <= raw_end` and `icmp_hdr + [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp_hdr[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m <= raw_end`.  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Assigns `pkt->icmp = icmp_hdr` if checks pass; otherwise returns.  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. In the general IPv4 handler [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m880[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   Added validation of IP version, IHL, header truncation, total length, and [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcropping `pkt->raw.len` to `frame_len` before downstream processing.[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Result  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The same fuzzing command was rerun with `-[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m`.  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- ASan reported again:  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  heap-buffer-overflow [0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mnet_builtin.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m385:18[0m[39m in rx_icmp[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  READ of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m at [0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The buffer region and call stack are identical to the original failure.  [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The newly inserted boundary checks did not prevent the out-of-bounds read in [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_icmp`.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The logic in `rx_icmp` around how `pkt->icmp` is computed and used—the patch’s [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minitial check did not catch the failing case.  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Earlier assignments to `pkt->icmp` in other code paths [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., raw Ethernet/IPv6 [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandlers[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m that may bypass the new checks.  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Consistency and update of `pkt->raw.len` and related `pkt->pay.len` fields across[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mall branches before `rx_icmp` is invoked.  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Interaction between `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` calls and header pointer arithmetic—the [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrelationship between `pkt->raw.buf`, `pkt->raw.len`, and payload/trailer pointers. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Any assumptions about structure alignment or minimal header sizes not enforced [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39macross all protocol demultiplexing code paths.[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m794[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m795[0m[39m:  uint16_t frag = [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->frag[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m796[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrag & IP_MORE_FRAGS_MSK || frag & IP_FRAG_OFFSET_MSK[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m797[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m798[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m799[0m[39m:    struct mg_connection *c = [0m[1;35mgetpeer[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->mgr, pkt, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m800[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m801[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m802[0m[39m:    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m803[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m804[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m805[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m806[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:382[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m390[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m382[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m383[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m384[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m385[0m[39m:    size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m386[0m[39m:    size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m387[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m388[0m[39m:    struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m389[0m[39m:                          [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m390[0m[39m:    struct icmp *icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
